vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
RBAC.roles (RBAC.sol#75) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (RBAC.sol#86-91)
	- hasRole (RBAC.sol#99-105)
	- addRole (RBAC.sol#112-117)
	- removeRole (RBAC.sol#124-129)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_role' of Roles.add (RBAC.sol#20) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_addr' of Roles.add (RBAC.sol#20) is not in mixedCase
